title: of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) (No.2) Order 2023.
heading: 1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Standards in Public Office (Transfer
text_raw:
1. (1) This Order may be cited as the Standards in Public Office (Transfer 
of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) (No.2) Order 2023. 

(2) This Order comes into operation on 5 July 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) order may cited standard public office (transfer departmental administration ministerial functions) (no.2) order 2023 (2) order come operation 5 july 2023

title: of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) (No.2) Order 2023.
heading: 2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise,
text_raw:
2. (1) The administration and business in connection with the exercise, 
performance or execution of any functions transferred by Article 3 are 
transferred to the Department of Public Expenditure, National Development Plan 
Delivery and Reform. 

(2) References to the Department of Finance contained in any Act or any 
instrument made under an Act and relating to the administration and business 
transferred by paragraph (1) shall, from the commencement of this Order, be 
construed as references to the Department of Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform.
text_norm: 2 (1) administration business connection exercise performance execution function transferred article 3 transferred department public expenditure national development plan delivery reform (2) reference department finance contained act instrument made act relating administration business transferred paragraph (1) shall commencement order construed reference department public expenditure national development plan delivery reform

title: of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) (No.2) Order 2023.
heading: 3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Finance –
text_raw:
3. (1) The functions vested in the Minister for Finance – 

(a) 

by virtue of the Standards in Public Office (Transfer of 
Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) Order 
2023 (S.I. No. 89 of 2023), and 

(b) by or under the Regulation of Lobbying and Oireachtas 
(Allowances to Members) (Amendment) Act 2023 (No. 15 of 
2023), are transferred to the Minister for Public Expenditure, 
National Development Plan Delivery and Reform. 

(2) References to the Minister for Finance contained in any Act or instrument 
made under an Act and relating to any functions transferred by paragraph (1) 
shall, from the commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the 
Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform.

title: of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) (No.2) Order 2023.
heading: 4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal
text_raw:
4. Where, immediately before the commencement of this Order, any legal 
proceedings are pending to which the Minister for Finance is a party and the 
proceedings have reference to functions transferred by this Order to the Minister 
for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform, the 
name of the Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan 
Delivery and Reform shall, in so far as the proceedings relate to any functions 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 21st July, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [367] 3 

transferred by this Order, be substituted in the proceedings for that of the 
Minister for Finance or added in the proceedings, as may be appropriate, and the 
proceedings shall not abate by reason of such substitution.

title: of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) (No.2) Order 2023.
heading: 5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or
text_raw:
5. Anything commenced before the commencement of this Order by or 
under the authority of the Minister for Finance may, in so far as it relates to a 
function transferred by this Order to the Minister for Public Expenditure, 
National Development Plan Delivery and Reform, be carried on or completed on 
or after such commencement by the Minister for Public Expenditure, National 
Development Plan Delivery and Reform.
text_norm: 5 anything commenced commencement order authority minister finance may far relates function transferred order minister public expenditure national development plan delivery reform carried completed commencement minister public expenditure national development plan delivery reform

title: of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) (No.2) Order 2023.
heading: 6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in
text_raw:
6. Every document (including any certificate or licence) granted or made in 
the exercise of a function transferred by this Order, if and insofar as it was 
operative immediately before the commencement of this Order, has effect from 
such commencement as if it had been granted or made by the Minister for Public 
Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform.
text_norm: 6 every document (including certificate licence) granted made exercise function transferred order insofar operative immediately commencement order effect commencement granted made minister public expenditure national development plan delivery reform

title: of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) (No.2) Order 2023.
heading: 7. References to the Minister for Finance contained in the constitution of
text_raw:
7. References to the Minister for Finance contained in the constitution of 
any company and relating to any function transferred by this Order shall, from 
the commencement of this Order, be construed as references to the Minister for 
Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform.
text_norm: 7 reference minister finance contained constitution company relating function transferred order shall commencement order construed reference minister public expenditure national development plan delivery reform

title: of Departmental Administration and Ministerial Functions) (No.2) Order 2023.
heading: 8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the
text_raw:
8. (1) All property, rights and liabilities held, enjoyed or incurred before the 
commencement of this Order by the Minister for Finance in connection with the 
functions transferred by this Order are transferred on the commencement to the 
Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform and, accordingly, without any further conveyance, transfer or 
assignment – 

(a) 

(b) 

(c) 

that property, both real and personal, vests in the Minister for 
Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and 
Reform, 

those rights are rights of the Minister for Public Expenditure, 
National Development Plan Delivery and Reform, and 

those liabilities are liabilities of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform. 

(2) All moneys, stocks, shares and securities transferred to the Minister for 
Public Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform by this 
Article which, on the commencement of this Order, are standing in the name of 
the Minister for Finance shall, on the request of the Minister for Public 
Expenditure, National Development Plan Delivery and Reform be transferred 
into the name of the Minister for Public Expenditure, National Development 
Plan Delivery and Reform. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [367] 

GIVEN under the Official Seal of the Government, 

4 July, 2023. 

LEO VARADKAR, 

Taoiseach.
